event.title: was featured in Time magazine on December 8, 1997

data.event: Wilmington was featured in Time magazine on December 8, 1997 as a small town that is attractive to suburban families.
The city was also featured in a 1995 publication entitled The 100 Best Small Towns in America.
Home to Wilmington College, founded in 1870 by the Society of Friends, the city and the surrounding area include more than a dozen Quaker meeting houses.
The town of Clinton was founded in 1810 as seat of the newly formed Clinton County; the name was changed to Wilmington in 1811.
